creator: m@tthias.net
text:
If I set "ForceLanguagePriority Fallback" in apache's configuration it is always
returning the smallest available file if a request is served that did not
contain an "Accept-Language" header.
To my understanding it should serve these requests as they were received with an
"Accept-Language" header with the content of the "LanguagePriority"
configuration setting.

creator: davi@apache.org
text:
The "ForceLanguagePriority Fallback" is described at length in the documentation,
including the "with or without Accept-Language header" case.

More details at:

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_negotiation.html#forcelanguagepriority

If you have a specific issue ForceLanguagePriority, please re-open the bug and
provide more details.
